message: INGREDIENTS 30g coconut oil 1/3 cup (80ml) fish sauce 1/3 cup (80ml) maple syrup 4cm piece (20g) ginger, sliced 2 tsp hot chilli sauce 6 dried red chillies Juice of 2 limes 6 soft-boiled eggs Coriander sprigs, baby red shiso, fried shallots, black and white sesame seeds and bean sprouts, to serve
